actions.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.

description: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to move $5 million from the DEA (enforcement) to the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Program (treatment) in keeping with the growing consensus to treat drug addiction as a public health issue.
purpose: An amendment numbered 78 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to move $5 million from the DEA (enforcement) to the Comprehensive Opioid Abuse Program (treatment) in keeping with the growing consensus to treat drug addiction as a public health issue.
